name: Hematology/Oncology

points: Burnout from delivering difficult news repeatedly
Limited time to process grief between patients
High patient volumes in infusion clinics
Complex patient management without adequate support
Long hours between clinic and hospital rounds
Insufficient APP support for patient load
Heavy call burden and emergent patient needs

motivations: More time per patient for quality care
Better call schedule and work-life balance
Access to clinical trials and cutting-edge therapies
